sqls.name: SIMPLE_FIELD_ASC_ORDER
sqls.sql: select * from tableA order by userId asc

sqls.name: SIMPLE_FIELD_DESC_ORDER
sqls.sql: select * from tableA order by userId desc

sqls.name: MULTI_FIELD_ASC_ORDER
sqls.sql: select * from tableA order by userId, startDate asc

sqls.name: MULTI_FIELD_DESC_ORDER
sqls.sql: select * from tableA order by userId, startDate desc

sqls.name: MULTI_FIELD_ORDER
sqls.sql: select * from tableA order by userId asc, startDate desc
